description: I can't get past the login screen with my company's MFA policy. Specifically, Duo. When Duo is triggered, I get a blank white screen, and no app push.
Does what it say's on the tin, all the features of the web version in a nice wrapper
Nice web version, solves problem with creating chrome shortcut for outlook

summary: The best app on Linux for Office 365

description: When I launch it, there's nothing in the window.
Your company uses a self-hosted OWA. However, you cannot access a different server. An option to select an alternative at the beginning would be nice... Otherwise, it's useless for us

Description is very misleading.
It is NOT an Outlook client, its a client for access the outlook.com website
Will not connect to any other Exchange server other than outlook.com.

Giving benefit of the doubt I assume developer is unaware that for many users "Outlook client" is used to connect to a corporate Exchange/OWA and not outlook.com. 

In any case, its unusable as an Outlook client as you cannot select your mail server (although I suspect this isnt the use case the developer has in mind).
summary: Its not an Outlook Client, its an Outlook.com client

description: Also you are making people fool or you urself is an idiot who doesnt know nothing about outlook.

Idea 5 star implementation a Try Harder next time!
So, if I open office365 in a web browser, I at least get sound notifications. In prospect mail there are no noticication sounds, or desktop pop-ups.

I find I'm firing up my Win10 VM less often as I can use Prospect Mail as my main client now. One very nice addition would be a task bar badge that shows the number of unread messages on top of the Prospect Mail icon.

I have tried countless email clients but none came close to what users of Outlook are used to. 
Prospect Mail is the best alternative for Ubuntu.
Works like a charm!
You can't sign in here with a personal account. Use your work or school account instead.
It is a great app which mimics outlook desktop application, but for me it works perfectly and offers everything I need. Would definitely recommend.

description: This is a great app, however I monitor 5 inboxes and this only allows me to view one at a time, so I can't really use it for work, which I would like to be able to.

My employer is Microsoft centric around everything 365. I didn't want to dedicate a personal PC to windows just to read email when working remotely. Prospect Mail to the rescue.
summary: Easy to set up and use

description: Using the web client is quite irritating. This was the best alternative to it.
A lot of these mail apps can be phony but this one is right there when you need it and very convenient to use.
After installation, I can run this snap one time, but ever after it will not run again, even after a reset. I do not see any feedback in the terminal about what might be happening.

In my opinion this app is very usefull for me. Here you can find a lot of functions the same as original MS Outlook app. Also you can create rules for inboxes messages and you needn't to move manualy them to specific folder. Thank you a lot developers :D

This is exactly what I was looking for!
The outlook replacement which I was looking for.

On the other hand, it is the best mail client for outlook.

description: Works, was easy to install and looks great

For some reason, my @live of Outlook stopped displaying my Contacts when I select the TO section, it didn't allow to delete a message, and I could not do any of the WP functions. Since I installed Prospect Mail, which also lists Outlook, I works as my @live email use to work. Hope Prospect stays functional. By the way, I use Linux Ubuntu Mate with the Pantheon Panels and have never had any issue with it in the 3+ years I made Linux my main OS.

If you open a link in email - it opens it fullscreen and you have to quit and restart app. Then you may be able to create a new window to get access to outlook - usually it opens back to that fullview browser view, without any way to do go back.
It's a wrapper around the webapp(s) and it does exacly that.

Exactement ce qui est dit et d'une stabilité étonnante.

C'est electron, et alors, ça ne sera jamais dépassé car Microsoft comme beaucoup de compagnies a entièrement optimisé Microsoft Office pour être utilisé depuis un navigateur. En tant qu'utilisateur de Microsoft Office, je peux dire que la version web d'Outlook est BIEN est plus stable et efficace que l'application (que ce soit sur Mac Android Windows).

Et donc Prospect-Mail, ça vous donne la version web stable et efficace supérieure d'Outlook sous la forme et le comportement d'une application, sans les problèmes de dépendances foireuses d'un portage.
Bref, parfait, encore une réussite avec electron.

Exactly what you expect from it.

Yeah that's electron, so what, it will never be outdated as Microsoft like many companies optimised Microsoft Office to be run from browser. As a MS Office user myself, I can say the web version is WAY more stable and efficient than the application (on Mac Android and Windows).

So Prospect-Mail delivers the efficiency and stability of the superior stable efficient web version as an app, behaving like an app, without the crappy dependencies issues of a port.
Simply perfect, another success with electron.
Ne contient pas la possibilité d'utiliser exchange
Просто вводите свой адрес, ответ программы - введите другой. И так до бесконечности.
